creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: small red shrine with greenish-tan roof in a grove of very tall trees
inscription: left: 自刻　昭和十六年作　神の森 {Jikoku, Shōwa jūrokunen saku, [?????]} | bottom, in grey: Sacred Grove | in pencil: Toshi Yoshida
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Sacred Grove
